body:
Comment 3: 
This is easy enough to fix, but lately I've been thinking of doing something like:

package mime
type Type string
func (t Type) Type() string  // major type
func (t Type) Subtype() string
func (t Type) Params() map[string]string
func (t Type) Param(p string) string

FormatMediaType(t, sub string, param map[string]string) Type

or Type as a struct, if using a string is not desirable.  But it's a simple enough
format & small string, easy to scan for boundaries.

Thoughts?
